text: Hi, there! Thanks for dropping by! Would you like to know a little bit more about Matthew McCord?

Matthew has been a professional full-stack web engineer since 2016, with a background as a self-taught programmer exploring game development, Windows APIs, and web technologies. Before that, he was a touring musician and worked various service industry gigs.
He has a strong passion for game development and continually expands his knowledge in software engineering and game design.
In his free time, he enjoys spending time with his partner and dogs, playing board games, and making music. For more details, connect via LinkedIn and other socialsâ€”or check out his games!
